works.description: This is what we can call a hobby turned obsession. Polish-born, Brooklyn artist Agata Oleksiak (aka Olek), who watches movies and makes art at the same time, lives with an aim to crochet everything that enters her space. From day-to-day things to bikes to cars, she has knitted almost everything. She is so much addicted to crocheting the things that she has covered her entire 15 x 14 feet studio apartment in crochet.
